scripts.test:e2e:dev: concurrently -k -s first -n DEV,TEST "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && node tools/smoke.test.js"
scripts.diagram:svg: mmdc -p tools/puppeteer.config.json -i docs/diagrams/etax_navigation.mmd -o docs/diagrams/etax_navigation.svg -b transparent -t neutral
scripts.diagram:png: mmdc -p tools/puppeteer.config.json -i docs/diagrams/etax_navigation.mmd -o docs/diagrams/etax_navigation.png -b transparent -t neutral
scripts.diagram:build: npm run diagram:svg && npm run diagram:png
